George Hanson

Experience

Software Developer II

Shaw Communications - Calgary, AB - October 2014 to May 2018

Translated manual test cases for Gateway and BlueskyTV cable boxes to Python scripts
Designed, implemented and deployed PHP MVC website to select and run test case scripts
Designed, implemented and deployed Ingest Package Creator for video metadata testing
Designed, implemented and deployed Django website to monitor Video Content ingest
Created SoapUI test cases to test API’s used to store metadata in MySQL and MSSQL DB’s
Designed and implemented Python REST API and deployed as Docker container
Performed system admin duties on Redhat Enterprise Linux server and Windows 2008 server

Software Developer

Windows Forms UI development and Backend VB.NET development
Lead maintenance developer for assigned production lines
Designed, implemented and deployed test software for RF radio base station
Lead developer for Terrace QAM test software rework to increase production line speed
Integrated .NET and third party test equipment API code

Electronics Technician

Vecima Networks - Saskatoon, SK - September 1995 to December 2004

Tested and repaired PCB sub-assemblies. Tested and repaired integrated systems.
Utilized digital multimeters, oscilloscopes, power meters, spectrum and network analyzers.
Soldered through hole and surface mount parts.
Assembled coax and wire cable assemblies.
Used hand and power tools to assemble, adjust and modify metal chassis.
Packaged finished product for shipment.
